skillTree.localised_description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.
New groups of cutthroats and murderers must be found to replenish the ranks.
Treason is never straightforward, especially when your every move is watched and reported.

effects.description:
On turn start, Lords have a chance to gain 2 loyalty
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The Reaver keeps private chests filled with riches stashed away, to be used to persuade the Druchii nobility... and provide for any personal desire.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Lords and Heroes
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife inâ€¦
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud â€“ these are the things that sustain me."
Take it all!
Don't kill everyone, we will be back.
Flexible and deadly combination of sword and handbow.

effects.description: Weapon: Sword and Handbow (fire while moving with 360 fire arc)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: You have to get up very early if you want to beat this one; nothing escapes their keen eye and lightning reflexes.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Deadly greatsword that can strike multiple enemies simultaneously.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Never to be broken or dishonoured - never to succumb to the foe.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! Itâ€™s just going to make me mad.
Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
Youâ€™ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: To rule over a black ark requires a truly vicious and ruthless soul. These Druchii are among the most dangerous and temperamental in all dark elf society.
